contactDescription: We welcome inquiries regarding international trade, project collaboration, and partnership opportunities.
liaisonOfficesCountries: Turkey, Brazil, China, Mongolia, Hong Kong, Singapore
heroSubtitle: Global Leaders in Trade & Project Development
aboutDescription1: Ikede Group has been a leader in the construction industry for over 20 years. We specialize in commercial and residential projects, and our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction is second to none.
aboutDescription2: Our team of experienced professionals is dedicated to delivering exceptional results on time and on budget. We pride ourselves on our attention to detail and our ability to exceed our clients' expectations.
missionDescription1: Our mission is to create long-lasting value for our clients through innovative and sustainable construction solutions. We are committed to safety, quality, and integrity in everything we do.
missionDescription2: We strive to be a company that our clients are proud to work with, our employees are proud to work for, and our community is proud to have.
constructionDescription: We offer a wide range of construction services, from residential to commercial projects.
architectureDescription: Our team of architects can help you design your dream project.
consultingDescription: We provide expert consulting services to help you with your construction needs.
realEstateDescription: We can help you find the perfect property for your next project.
landscapingDescription: Our landscaping services will make your property look its best.
renovationDescription: We can help you renovate your existing property to meet your needs.
presidentsWordDescription1: It is with great pride that I lead a team of dedicated professionals who are committed to excellence in everything they do. Our success is built on a foundation of integrity, innovation, and a relentless focus on our clients' needs.
presidentsWordDescription2: We are passionate about building a better future, and we are confident that our work will have a lasting positive impact on the communities we serve. Thank you for your continued trust and support.
